channel.title: GHANA Archives - The New Vibes
channel.description: Your source for the latest trends in business, Technology, Marketing, Lifestyle, Candid Vibez, Energy, and Health. With our fresh perspective and innovative approach, we bring you the insights and inspiration you need to thrive and be more productive in today's fast-paced world. Join our community and start creating the future you want today wherever you find yourself!

item.title: Call For Applications: The Hubert H. Humphrey Fellowship Program
item.dc:creator: Joseph Anim Darko
item.description:
The Hubert H. Humphrey Fellowship Program has opened its annual call for applications for the academic year 2023–2024, and the Public Affairs Division of U.S. Mission Ghana is delighted to make the announcement. A Fulbright exchange, the Hubert H. Humphrey Fellowship Program develops leadership skills among foreign professionals who work together to address regional...

The post Call For Applications: The Hubert H. Humphrey Fellowship Program appeared first on The New Vibes.

item.title: Leverage Technology Development To Build A Better Future – CEPE invites…
item.dc:creator: Joseph Anim Darko
item.description:
Once again Center For Practical Education (CEPE) is holding another webinar as part of its core objective to encourage a more practical form of theoretical education in the country and possibly, worldwide. For some couple of time, this foundation has strived to promote a need for “The use of the mind, heart and hand“ instead...
